none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 18, 2010 Description from Terminal Escape:
Probably recorded around the time that the '80s faded into the past, WITCHNAIL WOLF tried to bring the past with them and made this bizarre proto-anarcho/goth hybrid. Female vocals reminiscent of INTERNAL AUTONOMY dominate the songs, which otherwise create a vibe somewhere between later JOY DIVISION and early '80s anarcho punk, but demo versions of both. Only three songs here, certainly not for everyone...but perhaps for you. WITCHNAIL WOLF 
//2.bp.blogspot.com/_UWPI3C1CSoU/TQzxcoOk3AI/AAAAAAAABcI/cbWZ9bBqBxg/s1600/Witchnail+Wolf.jpg http://terminalescape.blogspot.com/search?q=autonomy+goth

seo.title: Withchnail Wolf - Witchnail Wolf demo 198? - Terminal Escape
